description: Convert data between Markdown and HTML

essential_properties.name: html
essential_properties.description: The HTML to be converted to markdown

essential_properties.name: markdown
essential_properties.description: The Markdown to be converted to html

essential_properties.name: destinationKey
essential_properties.description: The field to put the output in. Specify nested fields using dots, e.g."level1.level2.newKey".
